East Carolina University womens basketball  American Athletic Conference will face off against Tulane University   AAC on Jan PERIOD  at  p.m PERIOD in New Orleans Louisiana PERIOD

For this matchup the Pirates are coming off backtoback losses against Wichita State University   AAC and the Temple University Owls   AAC PERIOD Prior to the game against Temple the win over University of Cincinnati   AAC was the first win for the Pirates in a fourgame stretch after one postponement and three losses at the start of conference play PERIOD

The defensive intensity against Cincinnati was a bright point for ECUs season PERIOD The Bearcats shot . from the field as opposed to the Pirates . pERIOD Alongside the field goal percentage ECU was able to force  turnovers against the Bearcats PERIOD The Pirates were led in scoring by graduate student Raven Johnson who scored  points in  minutes of play PERIOD

Our defense is our bread thats our bread and butter PERIOD Good defense leads to easy offense for us and when were able to play our defense the way we play our defense it shows offensively Johnson said in a postgame interview posted on ECUPirates following the Cincinnati game PERIOD

The team is led defensively by graduate student forward Tylar Bennett with  total rebounds and  blocks on the season PERIOD Sophomore guard Alexsia Rose and junior guard Taniyah Thompson lead the team in steals with  and  respectively PERIOD Rose also leads the team in assists with  PERIOD

Offensively Thompson leads the team in scoring putting up  points so far through the season PERIOD Her point total doubles any other players on the team with junior guard Danae McNeal putting up the secondmost points at  PERIOD McNeal also leads the team in 3point percentage with an even  on the season PERIOD

Following the win the Pirates stayed home to play against the Owls who were dominant defensively PERIOD Temple only allowed . of field goal attempts with the lowest point of the game coming during the second quarter when the Pirates scored  points PERIOD The Pirates also shot . from the three and . from the free throw line PERIOD While ECU won the turnover battle with  steals it was not enough to surmount the Owls PERIOD

Prior to the game Wichita State and ECU were tied in alltime wins against each other PERIOD The Pirates were previously undefeated against the Shockers when scoring  or more points PERIOD The first win for the Pirates against Wichita State came on Jan PERIOD   PERIOD ECU won that game by a score of  PERIOD ECU has also never beaten Wichita at home PERIOD

Following the game against Tulane the Pirates will go headtohead against Southern Methodist University   AAC on Feb PERIOD  PERIOD Tipoff is scheduled for  p.m PERIOD in Greenville North Carolina PERIOD
